019package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNotEmptyArgument;
024
025import java.io.Serial;
026
027import org.apiguardian.api.API;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
029
030/**
031 *  Use the application error to signal the abort of an application.<br>
032 *  <br>This implementation of
033 *  {@link Error}
034 *  allows to set a flag that indicates whether this instance was already
035 *  logged or not. The flag is honoured by some methods in Foundation Logging.
036 *
037 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
038 *  @version $Id: ApplicationError.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
039 *  @since 0.0.5
040 */
041@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyConstructors", "unused"} )
042@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ApplicationError.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
043@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
044public class ApplicationError extends Error
045{
046        /*------------*\
047    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
048        \*------------*/
049    /**
050     *  A flag that indicates if the causing exception or the error condition
051     *  was already logged.
052     */
053    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedAssignment" )
054    private boolean m_IsAlreadyLogged = false;
055
056        /*------------------------*\
057    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
058        \*------------------------*/
059    /**
060     *  The serial version UID for objects of this class: {@value}.
061     *
062     *  @hidden
063     */
064    @Serial
065    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
066
067        /*--------------*\
068    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
069        \*--------------*/
070    /**
071     *  Creates a new {@code ApplicationError} instance. The 'isLogged' flag
072     *  is set to {@code false}.
073     *
074     *  @param  message The detail message. It is saved for later retrieval by
075     *      the
076     *      {@link #getMessage()}
077     *      method.
078     *
079     *  @see Error#Error(String)
080     */
081    public ApplicationError( final String message ) { this( message, false ); }
082
083    /**
084     *  Creates a new {@code ApplicationError} instance.
085     *
086     *  @param  message The detail message. It is saved for later retrieval by
087     *      the
088     *      {@link #getMessage()}
089     *      method.
090     *  @param  isLogged    {@code true} if the error condition or the
091     *      causing exception was already logged, {@code false} if it
092     *      still has to be logged.
093     */
094    public ApplicationError( final String message, final boolean isLogged )
095    {
096        super( requireNotEmptyArgument( message, "message" ) );
097
098        m_IsAlreadyLogged = isLogged;
099    }   //  ApplicationError()
100
101    /**
102     *  Creates a new {@code ApplicationError} instance. The '{@code isLogged}'
103     *  flag is set to {@code false}.
104     *
105     *  @param  cause   The cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the
106     *      {@link #getCause()}
107     *      method). Different from
108     *      {@link Error#Error(Throwable)}
109     *      is {@code null} not a valid value.
110     *
111     *  @see Error#Error(Throwable)
112     */
113    public ApplicationError( final Throwable cause ) { this( cause, false ); }
114
115    /**
116     *  Creates a new {@code ApplicationError} instance.
117     *
118     *  @param  cause   The cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the
119     *      {@link #getCause()}
120     *      method). Different from
121     *      {@link Error#Error(Throwable)}
122     *      is {@code null} not a valid value.
123     *  @param  isLogged    {@code true} if the error condition or the
124     *      causing exception was already logged, {@code false} if it
125     *      still has to be logged.
126     */
127    public ApplicationError( final Throwable cause, final boolean isLogged )
128    {
129        super( requireNonNullArgument( cause, "cause" ) );
130
131        m_IsAlreadyLogged = isLogged;
132    }   //  ApplicationError()
133
134    /**
135     *  Creates a new {@code ApplicationError} instance. The '{@code isLogged}'
136     *  flag is set to {@code false}.
137     *
138     *  @param  message The detail message. It is saved for later retrieval by
139     *      the
140     *      {@link #getMessage()}
141     *      method.
142     *  @param  cause   The cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the
143     *      {@link #getCause()}
144     *      method). Different from
145     *      {@link Error#Error(Throwable)}
146     *      is {@code null} not a valid value.
147     *
148     *  @see Error#Error(String, Throwable)
149     */
150    public ApplicationError( final String message, final Throwable cause ) { this( message, cause, false ); }
151
152    /**
153     *  Creates a new {@code ApplicationError} instance.
154     *
155     *  @param  message The detail message. It is saved for later retrieval by
156     *      the
157     *      {@link #getMessage()}
158     *      method.
159     *  @param  cause   The cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the
160     *      {@link #getCause()}
161     *      method). Different from
162     *      {@link Error#Error(Throwable)}
163     *      is {@code null} not a valid value.
164     *  @param  isLogged    {@code true} if the error condition or the
165     *      causing exception was already logged, {@code false} if it
166     *      still has to be logged.
167     */
168    public ApplicationError( final String message, final Throwable cause, final boolean isLogged )
169    {
170        super( requireNotEmptyArgument( message, "message" ), requireNonNullArgument( cause, "cause" ) );
171
172        m_IsAlreadyLogged = isLogged;
173    }   //  ApplicationError()
174
175        /*---------*\
176    ====** Methods **==========================================================
177        \*---------*/
178    /**
179     *  Returns the 'is logged' flag.
180     *
181     *  @return {@code true} if the error condition or the causing
182     *      exception were already logged, {@code false} otherwise.
183     */
184    public final boolean isLogged() { return m_IsAlreadyLogged; }
185
186    /**
187     *  Sets the 'is logged' flag to {@code true}.
188     */
189    public final void setLogged() { m_IsAlreadyLogged = true; }
190}
191//  class ApplicationError
192
193/*
194 *  End of File
195 */
